title: PM Kakar meets Sri Lankan President
content:
DAVOS, Jan 16 (APP):Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar on Tuesday met the Sri Lankan President Ranil Wickremsinghe here on the sidelines of the World Economic Forum.
During the meeting they discussed ways to promote trade and investment between the two countries.
The prime minister is attending the 54th annual meeting of World Economic Forum (WEF) in Davos, Switzerland.
